duties_responsibilities.duty: Setting and achieving ambitious fit and finish targets for luxury electric vehicles.
Collaborating across departments to ensure production feasibility and enhance overall quality.
Analyzing competitor vehicles to establish benchmarks and define essential interfaces for the vehicle.
Creating detailed sections for both Interior and Exterior interfaces and documenting them in a Build Objectives report.
Collaborating closely with Design Engineering, Dimensional, and manufacturing teams to set achievable targets.
Guaranteeing the fulfillment of Perceived/Optical quality targets through cross-functional reviews.
Employing tools such as Cubing Reference Models and Master Fixtures to uphold craftsmanship standards.
Suggesting alternative strategies for surface, cutline, and interface execution to achieve superior craftsmanship outcomes.
Assessing and contributing to the enhancement of sensory elements of the company's products.
Fostering working relationships with suppliers and overseeing the introduction of new products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in an Engineering discipline or related Science field (3 years experience required)
